螳臂當車.definition: lit. a mantis trying to stop a chariot (idiom); fig. to overrate oneself and attempt sth impossible; also written 螳臂擋車|螳臂挡车[tang2 bi4 dang3 che1]

螳螂捕蟬.definition: the mantis stalks the cicada, unaware of the oriole behind (idiom, from Daoist classic Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3]); to pursue a narrow gain while neglecting a greater danger

螳螂捕蟬，黃雀在後.pinyin: tang2 lang2 bu3 chan2 , huang2 que4 zai4 hou4
螳螂捕蟬，黃雀在後.definition: the mantis stalks the cicada, unaware of the oriole behind (idiom, from Daoist classic Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3]); to pursue a narrow gain while neglecting a greater danger
